content.text:
> "Iâ€™ll never call the police again"

This is a lesson everyone learns eventually. :oncoming_police_car:

Really though, I think it's important to realize that these hierarchies and expectations hurt *everyone*, and it's in all of our best interest to challenge and dismantle them. I appreciate you bringing up these issues, especially since they generally get brought up in opposition to feminist discussion rather than as another facet of the same problem. I think self-styled "men's rights activists" would be much more effective if they worked *with* feminists rather than against them.
